content.rendered:
Zero Microx Spray for protecting, maintaining and prolonging
the life of spectacles. Thanks to its protective layer, it allows a
protection on the frame and on the lenses, it removes the
present bacteria ensuring the sanitation of the device.
Zero Microx, an antibacterical product classified as a Class I
Medical Device.
